alert.note: Alert for East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 28 at 1:14PM MST until March 02 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 50 mph, with gusts up to 85 mph, are possible. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Reductions in visibility due to blowing snow and partial lane blockages due to drifting snow are possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: East Glacier Park Region; Northern High Plains; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
